text:
Food is without a doubt a major 
part of any country’s culture…

In today’s lesson we are going to learn English 
and a lot of aspects of British culture in regards

to food with none other than superstar singer 
Adele. Also, if you find Adele’s accent hard

to understand, we are going to understand 
why and explore a little bit more of it.

If you enjoy learning real life English with 
your favorite celebrities, then you should

subscribe to our channel, because every week 
we help you understand fast speaking natives

without getting lost, without missing 
the jokes and without subtitles.

So join over 4.7 million learners from around 
the world who are making learning English fun.

Now, we’d like to hear from you. What’s 
the typical breakfast in your country like?

Share in the comments below so we 
can all learn about the different
traditions related to food around the world.
